column1: Uchi////You could drop Uchi in LA and charge 3x the price. Blown away by this place. Great ambience
column3: unique flavors. We loved the cool tasting flavor combinations and fun spin on foie gras and vegetarian sushi. Only downside is no cocktails
column4: but don't let that keep you from experiencing this place. It was hopping for a Monday and not too pretentious for walk ins. The tasting menu that ran until 6:30PM was a steal. Glad this made our Houston list!
